items.sentence: I've been wearing this coat for more than three years.
My life would've been easier if I'd never left Boston.
Have you considered asking Tom to lend you some money?
There were only three soldiers guarding the prisoners.
Tom still goes fishing with his friends every weekend.
You're going to need more money than that, aren't you?
You're the only one to survive the attack, aren't you?
You're the only one who's able to do that, aren't you?
You're the only person who didn't do that, aren't you?
You're too young to remember the nineties, aren't you?
